channel.title: [Delta] Stores
channel.description:
Right, Iv got stores on Delta source, 1 Problem is how do I change the price of the items the stoor buys off a player? For example my store buys robins from players 800M Each. I DONT want this. How do I fix it so it buys for like 50K? Lol
Also, how do I change the Currency for a store like Tokens instead of coins.
Thanks - Brandon!
Source = Delta

item.title: [Delta] Stores

item.description:
@bhill wrote:

item.title: [Delta] Stores
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

item.cfg, find the item ID, you should see a line like this:

item = #### Item_Name Examination_Text Low Alch Value Shop Price High Alch Value The rest are bonuses

Read full topic
